thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Ken B
title: Excellent
text:
Located centrally with most of the major sightseeing attractions in easy walking distance.
However central doesn't mean noisy. Once inside, the soundproofing is excellent - important if you are a light sleeper like me.
The room was extremely well appointed including tea/coffee making equipment, choice of biscuits/nuts and a free minibar.
Buffet breakfast offered a wide and appetizing selection.
ALL the staff we encountered were courteous, efficient and friendly
